attributes.action: reverse the staged award, announced on Thursday 1 March, and resource a fair and decent pay award for nurses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to the announcement, nurses will receive an award of 1.5 per cent in April 2007 followed by 1 per cent in November. While on paper this may add up to 2.5 per cent, in real terms the award is only worth 1.9 per cent.

This is less than half the current rate of inflation and in real terms is a pay cut of 2.3 per cent (real worth of award minus current level of RPI inflation).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
